channel.description: Recent content in Pages on BMHS TSA

item.title: About
item.description: We are the Battle Mountain High School chapter of the Student Technology Association. Activities Capture The Flag (CTF) CTFs are fun and a great way for us to gain cybersecurity skills which is why we participate in them. Currently, we’ve participated in picoCTF 2021 and hope to compete in more CTFs in the future. eSports eSports promote team-work, problem solving skills, and of course they’re fun. Copyright Students retain full intellectual property rights to their content posted on both the source GitHub repository and this website.
